hero.subtitle: Find the perfect support for your loved ones.

concept.title: Care made simple
concept.subtitle: In just a few steps to the right caregiver
concept.step1Desc: Describe your care needs and preferences in just a few minutes.
concept.step2Desc: Our algorithm finds the best matching caregivers in your area.
concept.step3Desc: Contact your favorites directly and get to know each other.
concept.step4Desc: Start your care relationship with the perfect caregiver.

difference.title: Why Miteinander?
difference.subtitle: We combine technology with humanity
difference.card1Desc: No anonymous agencies - direct contact between families and caregivers.
difference.card2Desc: All caregivers are carefully vetted and verified.
difference.card4Desc: We accompany you throughout the entire care relationship.

app.title: Always with you
app.subtitle: Our app will soon be available for iOS and Android.

footer.description: The platform that connects families with the right caregivers. Personal, direct, human.

imprint.title: Imprint
imprint.vatIdInfo: VAT identification number according to ¬ß 27 a of the German VAT Act

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.generalInfoText: The following information provides a simple overview of what happens to your personal data when you visit this website. Personal data is any data that can be used to personally identify you.
privacy.dataProtectionText: The operators of these pages take the protection of your personal data very seriously. We treat your personal data confidentially and in accordance with statutory data protection regulations and this privacy policy.
privacy.responsiblePartyText: The responsible party for data processing on this website is:
privacy.cookiesText: Our websites use so-called 'cookies'. Cookies are small text files and do not cause any damage to your device. They are stored either temporarily for the duration of a session (session cookies) or permanently (permanent cookies) on your device.
privacy.contactFormText: If you send us inquiries via the contact form, your information from the inquiry form, including the contact data you provide there, will be stored by us for the purpose of processing the inquiry and in case of follow-up questions.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.scopeText: These General Terms and Conditions apply to all business relationships between Miteinander GmbH and its users. The version valid at the time of contract conclusion shall apply.
terms.serviceDescriptionText: The Miteinander platform enables the matching of people in need of care or their relatives with independent caregivers. Miteinander acts solely as a matching platform and is not a contracting party to the care agreements concluded between users.
terms.registrationText: Registration is required for the use of certain functions. The user is obliged to provide truthful information during registration and to keep it up to date.
terms.liabilityText: Miteinander is not liable for the quality of care services arranged through the platform. The responsibility for the proper provision of care services lies solely with the respective caregivers.
